Package dkeep.logic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Agent
    This is the superclass for game agents that can move around the map and have an associated position
    Coords
    This class is used to represent positions using x and y coordinates
    DrunkenGuard
    Guard that randomly falls asleep and may reverse its path
    DungeonMap
    Dungeon map, the first level
    Game  
    GameMap
    Superclass to the game map levels
    Guard
    Superclass to the all guards, contains common methods and variables
    Hero
    Implements the player controllable game agent
    KeepMap
    Keep map, the second level
    Ogre
    Implements the enemy for the second level (may be used elsewhere)
    RookieGuard
    The most simple guard
    SuspiciousGuard
    Guard that may reverse its movement
